name: Vegan Egg Salad
name_origin: A plant-based recreation of the classic egg salad. The distinctive sulfurous egg flavor comes from kala namak, a Himalayan black salt that naturally contains sulfur compounds.
description: Crumbled firm tofu seasoned with kala namak (black salt) creates an uncanny egg-like flavor. The turmeric adds the classic yellow color while nutritional yeast provides richness.
cultural_context: A modern vegan adaptation that has become popular in plant-based households worldwide.
vegan_adaptation_notes: Uses firm tofu and kala namak salt to replicate egg flavor

steps.instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water, then crumble into a bowl.
steps.tips: Use your hands for the best texture

steps.instruction: Add paprika, nutritional yeast, kala namak, black pepper, and turmeric. Mix well.
Add vegan mayo and green onion if using. Mix until combined.
Taste and adjust seasonings. Serve on bread or with crackers.

intro_paragraph: This plant-based interpretation of classic egg salad relies on the magic of kala namak. Also known as Himalayan black salt, this mineral provides the distinctive sulfurous aroma essential to the dish. Crumbled tofu replaces the boiled eggs perfectly, absorbing the vibrant turmeric and rich mayonnaise for a nostalgic deli favorite.

image.generation_prompt: A rustic, hand-thrown ceramic bowl filled with vibrant yellow vegan egg salad sits atop an antique, weathered wooden table in a sunlit Safed stone kitchen. The salad features distinct, irregular chunks of crumbled firm tofu that perfectly mimic the texture of boiled egg whites, thoroughly coated in a rich and creamy turmeric-infused dressing. Freshly chopped green onions and coarse black pepper flecks contrast beautifully against the golden hue of the mixture. Beside the main bowl lies a thick slice of crusty, artisanal sourdough bread topped generously with the savory spread. The background reveals the authentic texture of rough-hewn limestone walls and a vintage copper pot hanging near a deep arched window, evoking the historic atmosphere of an early 20th-century home in the Galilee. Soft, warm natural light streams in from the side, highlighting the moist and creamy texture of the tofu mixture and emphasizing the appetizing gloss of the vegan mayonnaise, making the dish look indistinguishable from a traditional deli favorite.
